name: Slimevulture
description:
Summary

Finally, you’ve infiltrated the holy place of the filthy humans to take revenge. 
Once the sun rises the highest graveyard keeper will probably get you. 
To defeat him you should harvest graves to improve your abilities!

Controls

WASD:          Movement
 LMB:              Attack
E:                      Interact with graves/items
1/2:                 Switch weapons
Heads:           Higher attack speed
Arms:             More weapon slots
Legs:              Higher movement speed
Torso:            Higher max. HP

Team

zeichn - Digital Artist

manio – Sound Director

ThePeat, serefbulbul, Julian and tomfu – Developers

Foreign Assets

Haunted House Font https://www.1001freefonts.com/de/haunted-house.font
